NEW YORK STATE EDUCATIONAL RADIO AND TELEVISION ASSOCIATION
Spring Meeting - June 11-13, 1964 - New York City
ADVANCE PROGRAM
Thursday, Tune 11th -
12 Noon
Board of Trustees and Officers LUNCHEON MEETING,
Park Crescent Hotel
3:00 pm
REGISTRATION -
5:30 pm
DINNER ON YOUR OWN -
7:00- 3:30 pm
NYSERTA RECEPTION - Crescent Room, Park Crescent Hotel
8:30 pm
KEYNOTE SESSION - Speaker to be announced.
Friday, Tune 12th
9:00 am
COFFEE AND DONUTS - Crescent Room
9:30-11:30 am
FIRST GENERAL SESSION -
"Some Outstanding Accomplishments in Closed Circuit
Television"
Chairman: William L. Millard, Office of Institutional
Research, Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute,
Troy
Speaker: Irving Settel, Director, Telecommunications
Center, Pace College, New York City
(OTHERS TO BE ANNOUNCED)
12:30- 2:00 pm
LUNCHEON - Crescent Room
"Educational Communications-A Profession?"
Chairman: Lou Kleinman, Station WNYE, New York
Board of Education, New York City.
